```{r, message=F, warning=F, error=F, comment=NA}
aoi = sf::read_sf("/Users/seamus/Documents/TREES-Active/Ecuador/PRELEAF_4FEB2025/4. AnaÌlisis de datos /Shapefiles/Estratos_Potenciales_Bosque_V2020_SinNB.shp")

tmap::tmap_mode("view")
tmap::tm_shape(aoi) + 
  tmap::tm_borders(col="red") + 
  tmap::tm_basemap("Esri.WorldImagery")


aoi$area_m2 = round(as.numeric(sf::st_area(aoi) * 0.0001, 4))
aoi = aoi |>
  sf::st_drop_geometry() |>
  janitor::adorn_totals() 
aoi
```
